summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Eight Hundred Forty-two and 16/100 Dollars ($842.16), or so much thereof as may be necessary from the General Fund of the City of Seattle, to pay the City's portion of the cost of the improvement of Seventeenth Avenue South, and other streets and avenues, by planking the same, as provided for by Ordinance No. 19512, creating Local Improvement District No. 1866.
